{"metadata":{"objective":"Rebutting an argument","lastStepAudioPath":""},"steps":[{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>You are</strong></span> mediating a family disagreement between your sister and her sons (your nephews) about how much they use their phones.&nbsp; In order to give her your best advice, you need to understand all sides of the issue.<br style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\" /><br />You have listened to your sister&#39;s argument and her evidence; now it&#39;s time to hear from your nephews.<br /><br /><strong><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\">Your next step</span></strong> is understand what makes a good rebuttal, and then listen to what your nephews have to say.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Try it!</strong></span><br /><br /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;\">Note for screen readers: Press Alt + 1 , or option + 1 on Mac, to open the try it information box in a new window and access information needed to answer some of the questions. In the content, this needed information is described as being in the box or table to the right.</span></span></p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\"><tbody><tr><td><p><strong>Turn off the phone</strong></p><p>Your sister says, &quot;Family members should spend no more than two hours per day on their phones because this limit will give the family more time to spend together.&quot;</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Your nephews have their say"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>A <strong>rebuttal</strong> (or <strong>counter-argument</strong>) is a type of argument used to challenge the original argument.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows three stages of an argument: the argument, the rebuttal, and the counter-rebuttal.    In the argument stage, your sister makes her argument. In the rebuttal stage, your nephews attack the argument. In the counter-rebuttal stage, your sister attacks the rebuttal and supports the argument.  This mini-lesson is about the rebuttal stage in which your nephews attack your sister's argument.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"Preparing a rebuttal"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Here are three strategies you can use to rebut an argument:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul><li>If the argument is based on <strong>facts or data</strong>, point out flaws or gaps in the information.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the argument is based on <strong>logic</strong>, attack the logic.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the argument is based on <strong>expert opinion</strong>, try to discredit it.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul><p>You can also attack the reasons for the argument (the <em>becaus</em>e).<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This argument uses <strong>data</strong> as evidence:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Luscious Peanut Butter is the best peanut butter available because of its smooth, creamy texture and high-quality ingredients.&nbsp; </span><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">In a recent taste test, 90% of those tested said they preferred Luscious Peanut Butter to the best-selling peanut butter.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>What is the flaw or gap in the data?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_c0d08414-011a-c51b-c085-5bb2f0de3097\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_c0d0...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This statement is attempting to make an argument based on <strong>logical evidence</strong>:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">We need to ban aluminum baseball bats because they are so dangerous.&nbsp; If you don&#39;t favor this ban, you must not care if children get hurt.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>What is the problem with the logic of this argument?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_37c8ee26-23c1-64d0-4237-44714e9e558c\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_37c8...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This argument offers an <strong>expert opinion</strong> as evidence:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">We need to ban the use of trans fats in foods sold at the supermarket and in the meals served in restaurants.&nbsp; </span><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Doctor Steven McGuinness, a veterinarian who has a popular YouTube channel, has expressed his support for banning trans fats.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How can you discredit the expert opinion given here?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_c6ff4bb5-2e54-8073-8548-5abac14ea8ac\" style=\"width: 200px; Your sister&#39;s evidence is in the box to the right<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Your nephews' rebuttal"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your sister&#39;s argument:</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Studies have shown that teenagers who spend excessive amounts of time on their phones tend to withdraw from family life and are subject to depression and anxiety.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>What gaps in the data or information can your nephews point to?&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_8fa9eed0-eff0-d389-b263-5b6071a2d78b\" style=\"width: 200px; Which piece of expert opinion can they use to rebut your sister&#39;s evidence?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_bd312002-d923-c45c-449b-f451b20333a1\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_b304...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your nephews could look for additional evidence to support their rebuttal, but they are satisfied with what they have.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your nephews can rebut your sister&#39;s argument in a few ways:</p><ul style=\"padding-left:15px;\"><li>They can point to flaws or weaknesses in evidence.</li><li>They can introduce new evidence that contradicts your sister&#39;s evidence.</li><li>They can attack the logic of your sister&#39;s claim or reason.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Your nephews&#39; rebuttal:</span><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Studies have confirmed that it is important for teenagers to develop lives outside the family.&nbsp; Maintaining friendships is essential for adolescents to develop into healthy adults.&nbsp; Also, much of today&rsquo;s communication, even in the workplace, takes place electronically.&nbsp; Therefore, by using technology, people are actually developing important skills.&nbsp; According to the National Institutes of Health, recent studies have failed to identify any link between phone use and nearsightedness or insomnia.&nbsp; Finally, we eat dinner together as much as possible and we do a family activity together on the weekends.&nbsp; We already spend plenty of time together as a family!</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Putting it all together"}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_a90616aa-0f63-0801-b94f-6a5464aa3b17":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Much of today’s communication, even in the workplace, takes place electronically. Therefore, by using technology, people are actually developing important skills.","fixed":false},{"text":"Our mother is behind the times and does not understand how people communicate today.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not a flaw in logic.
